dct_description_sm: In margin: 2. Double hemispherical world map on a globular projection; relief shown by hachures. Probably issued as plate 2 of: Bradley's atlas of the world for commercial and library reference. Philadelphia : Wm. M. Bradley & Bros., 1884.
